A earlier iteration of one of the games that got me started, its simple style hits really good. Portal 2 maybe does a lot better in the story department and differentiating between puzzles, but portal did set the stage with a great mechanic and characters for a puzzle game.

A pesar de no tener muchisimas horas registradas en este juego puedo decir que es uno de los mejores juegos con historia, en lo personal me atrapo el hecho de tener que averiguar el como resolver las cosas, sin duda pienso volver a jugarlo al igual que el siguiente juego.

good platforming fun, levels are a good balance between impossible and easy. The personality of this game is unmatchable. I highly suggest getting this. I did get this on sale for $2, but I would have bought it for $10
